info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-ap-global-oper
info.description:
This module contains access point operational data aggregated across wireless processes.
     Copyright (c) 2020-2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 20
